如果 type 是 commonjs -可以是 single 或 multiple
如果 type 为 commonjs -可以为 single ， multiple 或 pure

other absolute or server-relative requests are not supported by default, but they might be supported by some tools or environments.

trans-unit.source: preload: resource might be needed during the current navigation

trans-unit.source: relative requests are supported, pointing to other files within the package.
trans-unit.target: 支持相对请求,指向包中的其他文件。

trans-unit.source: skip over: don't include it, don't evaluate it but continue analysing dependencies
trans-unit.target: 跳过:不要包含它,不要评估它,而是继续分析依赖性。

trans-unit.source: webpack 1 requires a specific loader to convert ES2015 import, however this is possible out of the box via webpack 2
trans-unit.target: webpack 1需要特定的加载程序来转换ES2015 import ，但是可以通过webpack 2进行开箱即用

trans-unit.source: webpack 4 outputs a large amount of data with its stats.toJson() by default. Avoid retrieving portions of the stats object unless necessary in the incremental step. webpack-dev-server after v3.1.3 contained a substantial performance fix to minimize the amount of data retrieved from the stats object per incremental build step.
trans-unit.target: webpack 4 默认使用 stats.toJson() 输出大量数据。除非在增量步骤中有必要，否则避免检索 stats 对象的部分。 webpack-dev-server 之后的webpack-dev-server包含一个重要的性能修复程序，以最大程度地减少每个增量构建步骤从 stats 对象检索的数据量。

trans-unit.source: webpack 4.6.0+ adds support for prefetching and preloading.
trans-unit.target: webpack 4.6.0+增加了对预取和预加载的支持。

trans-unit.source: webpack 4: Code Splitting, chunk graph and the splitChunks optimization
webpack accepts configuration files written in multiple programming and data languages.
trans-unit.target: webpack接受用多种编程和数据语言编写的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: webpack accepts configuration files written in multiple programming and data languages. The list of supported file extensions can be found at the node-interpret package. Using node-interpret, webpack can handle many different types of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: webpack接受以多种编程和数据语言编写的配置文件。可以在节点解释包中找到受支持的文件扩展名的列表。使用node-interpret，webpack可以处理许多不同类型的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: webpack accepts configuration files written in multiple programming and data languages. The list of supported file extensions can be found at the node-interpret package. Using node-interpret, webpack can handle many different types of configuration files.
trans-unit.target: webpack接受以多种编程和数据语言编写的配置文件。可以在节点解释包中找到受支持的文件扩展名的列表。使用node-interpret，webpack可以处理许多不同类型的配置文件。

trans-unit.source: webpack applies configuration defaults after plugins defaults are applied.
trans-unit.target: 在应用插件默认值之后，webpack将应用配置默认值。

trans-unit.source: webpack can compile for multiple environments or targets. To understand what a target is in detail, read through the targets concept page.
trans-unit.target: webpack可以针对多种环境或目标进行编译。要详细了解 target ，请通读目标概念页面。

trans-unit.source: webpack can watch files and recompile whenever they change. This page explains how to enable this and a couple of tweaks you can make if watching does not work properly for you.
trans-unit.target: webpack 可以监视文件并在文件发生变化时重新编译。本页解释了如何启用这个功能,以及如果观看不能正常工作时可以进行的一些调整。

trans-unit.source: webpack cares about performance and load times; it's always improving or adding new features, such as async chunk loading and prefetching, to deliver the best possible experience for your project and your users.
trans-unit.target: webpack关心性能和加载时间;它一直在改进或添加新的功能,如异步分块加载和预取,为你的项目和用户提供最好的体验。

trans-unit.source: webpack comes with certain presets available for the stats output:
trans-unit.target: webpack为统计输出提供了一些预设。

trans-unit.source: webpack core can emit logging output, e.g. timing data
trans-unit.target: webpack核心可以发出日志输出,例如:定时数据。

trans-unit.source: webpack does extra algorithmic work to optimize the output for size and load performance. These optimizations are performant for smaller codebases, but can be costly in larger ones:
trans-unit.target: webpack做了额外的算法工作来优化输出的大小和负载性能。这些优化对于较小的代码库来说是很好的,但对于较大的代码库来说,可能会付出高昂的代价。

trans-unit.source: webpack enables use of loaders to preprocess files. This allows you to bundle any static resource way beyond JavaScript. You can easily write your own loaders using Node.js.
trans-unit.target: webpack允许使用加载程序来预处理文件。这使您可以捆绑JavaScript以外的任何静态资源。您可以使用Node.js轻松编写自己的加载程序。

trans-unit.source: webpack has a rich plugin interface. Most of the features within webpack itself use this plugin interface. This makes webpack flexible.
trans-unit.target: webpack具有丰富的插件界面。Webpack本身的大多数功能都使用此插件界面。这使webpack变得灵活。

trans-unit.source: webpack has the ability to generate path info in the output bundle. However, this puts garbage collection pressure on projects that bundle thousands of modules. Turn this off in the options.output.pathinfo setting:
trans-unit.target: webpack能够在输出包中生成路径信息。但是，这给捆绑了数千个模块的项目带来了垃圾回收压力。在 options.output.pathinfo 设置中将其关闭：

trans-unit.source: webpack is capable of adding nonce to all scripts that it loads. To activate the feature set a __webpack_nonce__ variable needs to be included in your entry script. A unique hash based nonce should be generated and provided for each unique page view this is why __webpack_nonce__ is specified in the entry file and not in the configuration. Please note that nonce should always be a base64-encoded string.
trans-unit.target: webpack能够将 nonce 添加到它加载的所有脚本中。要激活功能集，需要在输入脚本中包含 __webpack_nonce__ 变量。应该生成一个基于哈希的唯一随机数，并为每个唯一的页面视图提供该随机数，这就是为什么在条目文件中而不是在配置中指定 __webpack_nonce__ 的原因。请注意， nonce 应始终为base64编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: webpack is used to compile JavaScript modules. Once installed, you can interact with webpack either from its CLI or API. If you're still new to webpack, please read through the core concepts and this comparison to learn why you might use it over the other tools that are out in the community.
trans-unit.target: webpack用于编译JavaScript模块。一旦安装，你可以用的WebPack无论是从它的交互CLI或API。如果您仍然不熟悉Webpack，请通读核心概念和此比较以了解为什么您可能会在社区中其他工具上使用它。

trans-unit.source: webpack logger is available to loaders and plugins. Emitting as part of the Stats and configured by the user in webpack configuration.
trans-unit.target: webpack记录器可用于加载程序和插件。作为统计信息的一部分进行发射，并由用户在webpack配置中进行配置。

trans-unit.source: webpack only emits updated chunks to the filesystem. For some configuration options (HMR, [name]/[chunkhash] in output.chunkFilename, [hash]) the entry chunk is invalidated in addition to the changed chunks.
trans-unit.target: webpack只向文件系统发出更新的块。对于某些配置选项（HMR， [name] / [chunkhash] 在 output.chunkFilename ， [hash] ）的入口块被除了改变块无效。

trans-unit.source: webpack only emits updated chunks to the filesystem. For some configuration options, (HMR, [name]/[chunkhash]/[contenthash] in output.chunkFilename, [fullhash]) the entry chunk is invalidated in addition to the changed chunks.
trans-unit.target: webpack只向文件系统发出更新的块。对于某些配置选项，（HMR， [name] / [chunkhash] / [contenthash] 在 output.chunkFilename ， [fullhash] )的入口块被除了改变块无效。

trans-unit.source: webpack parses for require.context() in the code while building.
trans-unit.target: 在构建时，webpack解析代码中的 require.context() 。

trans-unit.source: webpack parses the require() call and extracts some information:
trans-unit.target: webpack解析 require() 调用并提取一些信息：

trans-unit.source: webpack provides a Node.js API which can be used directly in Node.js runtime.
trans-unit.target: webpack提供了一个Node.js API,可以直接在Node.js运行时使用。

trans-unit.source: webpack provides a set of options for developers that want more control over this functionality.
trans-unit.target: webpack提供了一系列的选项,让开发者可以对这些功能有更多的控制。

trans-unit.source: webpack provides an advanced mechanism to resolve files. The sass-loader uses Sass's custom importer feature to pass all queries to the webpack resolving engine. Thus you can import your Sass modules from node_modules. Just prepend them with a ~ to tell webpack that this is not a relative import:
trans-unit.target: webpack提供了一种高级的文件解析机制。sass-loader使用Sass的自定义导入器功能将所有查询传递到Webpack解析引擎。因此，您可以从 node_modules 导入Sass模块。只需在它们前面加上 ~ 即可告诉webpack这不是相对导入：

trans-unit.source: webpack provides an advanced mechanism to resolve files. The less-loader applies a Less plugin that passes all queries to the webpack resolver. Thus you can import your Less modules from node_modules. Just prepend them with a ~ which tells webpack to look up the modules.
trans-unit.target: webpack提供了一种高级的文件解析机制。该 less-loader 适用一个都不能少插件通过所有查询到的WebPack解析器。因此，您可以从 node_modules 导入Less模块。只需在它们前面加上 ~ 告诉webpack查找 modules 。

trans-unit.source: webpack provides an advanced mechanism to resolve files. The less-loader applies a Less plugin that passes all queries to the webpack resolver. Thus you can import your Less modules from node_modules. Just prepend them with a ~ which tells webpack to look up the modules.
trans-unit.target: webpack提供了一种高级的文件解析机制。该 less-loader 适用一个都不能少插件通过所有查询到的WebPack解析器。因此，您可以从 node_modules 导入Less模块。只需在它们前面加上 ~ 告诉webpack查找 modules 。

trans-unit.source: webpack provides reasonable defaults for these options depending on your build target.
trans-unit.target: webpack 根据您的构建目标为这些选项提供合理的默认值。

trans-unit.source: webpack runs on Node.js version 8.x and higher.
webpack runs on Node.js, a JavaScript runtime that can be used in computers and servers outside a browser environment.
trans-unit.target: webpack运行在Node.js上,Node.js是一个JavaScript运行时,可以在浏览器环境之外的计算机和服务器中使用。

trans-unit.source: webpack supported processing ECMAScript Modules to optimize them.
trans-unit.target: webpack支持处理ECMAScript模块,对其进行优化。

trans-unit.source: webpack supports all browsers that are ES5-compliant (IE8 and below are not supported). webpack needs Promise for import() and require.ensure(). If you want to support older browsers, you will need to load a polyfill before using these expressions.
trans-unit.target: webpack支持所有符合ES5的浏览器（不支持IE8及以下版本）。webpack需要 Promise 的 import() 和 require.ensure() 。如果要支持较旧的浏览器，则需要在使用这些表达式之前加载一个polyfill。

trans-unit.source: webpack supports all browsers that are ES5-compliant (IE8 and below are not supported). webpack needs Promise for import() and require.ensure(). If you want to support older browsers, you will need to load a polyfill before using these expressions.
trans-unit.target: webpack支持所有符合ES5的浏览器（不支持IE8及以下版本）。webpack需要 Promise 的 import() 和 require.ensure() 。如果要支持较旧的浏览器，则需要在使用这些表达式之前加载一个polyfill。

trans-unit.source: webpack supports modules written in a variety of languages and preprocessors, via loaders. Loaders describe to webpack how to process non-JavaScript modules and include these dependencies into your bundles. The webpack community has built loaders for a wide variety of popular languages and language processors, including:
trans-unit.target: webpack支持通过加载程序以多种语言和预处理器编写的模块。装载机描述到的WebPack 如何处理非JavaScript 模块和包括这些依赖关系到你的包。Webpack社区已经为各种流行语言和语言处理器构建了加载器，包括：

trans-unit.source: webpack supports the following module types natively:
trans-unit.target: webpack原生支持以下模块类型。

trans-unit.source: webpack supports to following module types natively:
trans-unit.target: webpack原生支持以下模块类型。

trans-unit.source: webpack then tries to load the babel package instead of the babel-loader.
trans-unit.target: 然后，webpack尝试加载 babel 软件包而不是 babel-loader 。

trans-unit.source: webpack uses a regular expression to determine which files it should look for and serve to a specific loader. In this case any file that ends with .css will be served to the style-loader and the css-loader.
trans-unit.target: webpack使用正则表达式来确定应查找哪些文件并将其提供给特定的加载程序。在这种情况下，任何以 .css 结尾的文件都将提供给 style-loader 和 css-loader 。

trans-unit.source: webpack uses a regular expression to determine which files it should look for and serve to a specific loader. In this case, any file that ends with .css will be served to the style-loader and the css-loader.
trans-unit.target: webpack使用正则表达式来确定应查找哪些文件并将其提供给特定的加载程序。在这种情况下，任何以 .css 结尾的文件都将提供给 style-loader 和 css-loader 。

trans-unit.source: webpack uses the file system to get notified of file changes. In some cases this does not work. For example, when using Network File System (NFS). Vagrant also has a lot of problems with this. In these cases, use polling:
trans-unit.target: webpack使用文件系统来通知文件更改。在某些情况下，这不起作用。例如，在使用网络文件系统（NFS）时。流浪汉对此也有很多问题。在这些情况下，请使用轮询：

trans-unit.source: webpack uses the file system to get notified of file changes. In some cases, this does not work. For example, when using Network File System (NFS). Vagrant also has a lot of problems with this. In these cases, use polling:
trans-unit.target: webpack使用文件系统来通知文件更改。在某些情况下，这不起作用。例如，当使用网络文件系统（NFS）时。流浪汉对此也有很多问题。在这些情况下，请使用轮询：

trans-unit.source: webpack v4+ will minify your code by default in production mode.
trans-unit.target: 在 production mode ，默认情况下，webpack v4 +会最小化您的代码。

trans-unit.source: webpack will add the prefetch hint once the parent chunk has been loaded.
trans-unit.target: 一旦父块被加载,webpack就会添加预获取提示。

trans-unit.source: webpack will automatically split chunks based on these conditions:
trans-unit.target: webpack会根据这些条件自动分割chunks。

trans-unit.source: webpack will generate a runtime code for web platform and will use only ES5 features.
trans-unit.target: webpack将生成web平台的运行时代码,并且只使用ES5特性。

trans-unit.source: webpack will not write output file when file already exists on disk with the same content.
trans-unit.target: 当磁盘上已经存在相同内容的文件时,webpack将不会写入输出文件。

trans-unit.source: webpack will run the function exported by the configuration file and wait for a Promise to be returned. Handy when you need to asynchronously load configuration variables.
trans-unit.target: webpack将运行配置文件导出的函数,并等待一个Promise返回。当你需要异步加载配置变量时很方便。

trans-unit.source: webpack will try to evaluate conditional statements. If it succeeds then the dead branch is removed. webpack can't do constant folding unless the compiler knows it. For example:
trans-unit.target: webpack会尝试评估条件语句。如果成功了,那么死分支就会被删除。除非编译器知道,否则webpack不能做恒定的折叠。例如
webpack的自动重复数据删除算法示例

trans-unit.source: webpack's environment variables are different from the environment variables of operating system shells like bash and CMD.exe
trans-unit.target: webpack的环境变量不同于 bash 和 CMD.exe 等操作系统外壳的环境变量

trans-unit.source: webpack-cli offers a variety of commands to make working with webpack easy. By default webpack ships with
trans-unit.target: webpack-cli提供了多种命令来使webpack的工作变得简单。在默认情况下,webpack提供了以下命令

trans-unit.source: webpack-cli offers a variety of commands to make working with webpack easy. By default webpack ships with the following flags:
trans-unit.target: webpack-cli 提供了一系列的命令来使webpack的工作变得简单。默认情况下,webpack有以下标志。

trans-unit.source: webpack-dev-server can be used to quickly develop an application. See the "How to Develop?" to get started.
trans-unit.target: webpack-dev-server可用于快速开发应用程序。参见“如何发展？” 开始。

trans-unit.source: webpack-dev-server doesn't write any output files after compiling. Instead, it keeps bundle files in memory and serves them as if they were real files mounted at the server's root path. If your page expects to find the bundle files on a different path, you can change this with the publicPath option in the dev server's configuration.
trans-unit.target: webpack-dev-server编译后不写入任何输出文件。相反，它将捆绑文件保留在内存中，并像在服务器根路径上挂载的真实文件一样提供它们。如果您的页面希望在其他路径上找到捆绑文件，则可以使用开发服务器配置中的 publicPath 选项更改此文件。

trans-unit.source: webpack-dev-server will include a script in your bundle that connects to a WebSocket to reload when a change in any of your files occurs. The --public flag makes sure the script knows where to look for the WebSocket. The server will use port 8080 by default, so we should also specify that here.
trans-unit.target: webpack-dev-server将在您的捆绑软件中包含一个脚本，该脚本将连接到WebSocket以在任何文件发生更改时重新加载。该 --public 标志可以确保脚本知道到哪里寻找WebSocket的。默认情况下，服务器将使用端口 8080 ，因此我们也应在此处指定该端口。

trans-unit.source: which is what enables users to leave off the extension when importing:
trans-unit.target: 这就是让用户在导入时可以不使用扩展名的原因。

trans-unit.source: will name the AMD module of the UMD build. Otherwise an anonymous define is used.
trans-unit.target: 将命名为UMD构建的AMD模块。否则， define 使用匿名定义。

trans-unit.source: write and execute functions to generate a part of the configuration
trans-unit.target: 编写和执行函数来生成部分配置。

trans-unit.source: your build script & server just to install a dependency you didn't know you needed until now.
trans-unit.target: 您的构建脚本和服务器只是为了安装到目前为止不知道需要的依赖项。

trans-unit.source: ℹ If a true the sourceMap, sourceMapRoot, sourceMapEmbed, sourceMapContents and omitSourceMapUrl from sassOptions will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: ℹ如果 true 的 sourceMap ， sourceMapRoot ， sourceMapEmbed ， sourceMapContents 和 omitSourceMapUrl 从 sassOptions 将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: ℹ In some rare cases node-sass can output invalid source maps (it is a node-sass bug).
trans-unit.target: ℹ在极少数情况下， node-sass 可以输出无效的源映射（这是 node-sass 的错误）。

trans-unit.source: ℹ Since you're injecting code, this will break the source mappings in your entry file. Often there's a simpler solution than this, like multiple Less entry files.
trans-unit.target: ℹ由于正在注入代码，因此这将破坏条目文件中的源映射。通常，有比这更简单的解决方案，例如多个Less条目文件。

trans-unit.source: ℹ Since you're injecting code, this will break the source mappings in your entry file. Often there's a simpler solution than this, like multiple Stylus entry files.
trans-unit.target: ℹ由于正在注入代码，因此这将破坏条目文件中的源映射。通常有比这更简单的解决方案，例如多个手写笔输入文件。

trans-unit.source: ℹ We recommend not to set the outFile, sourceMapContents, sourceMapEmbed, sourceMapRoot options because sass-loader automatically sets these options when the sourceMap option is true.
trans-unit.target: ℹ我们建议不要设置 outFile ， sourceMapContents ， sourceMapEmbed 和 sourceMapRoot 选项，因为当 sourceMap 选项为 true 时， sass-loader 会自动设置这些选项。
g️ @gfx/zopfli 需要至少 8 版本的 node 。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ webpack < v4.0.0 currently contains v0.4.6 of this plugin under webpack.optimize.UglifyJsPlugin as an alias. For usage of the latest version (v1.0.0), please follow the instructions below. Aliasing v1.0.0 as webpack.optimize.UglifyJsPlugin is scheduled for webpack v4.0.0
trans-unit.target: ℹ️ webpack < v4.0.0 目前包含 v0.4.6 下这个插件的 webpack.optimize.UglifyJsPlugin 作为别名。要使用最新版本（ v1.0.0 ），请按照以下说明进行操作。别名 v1.0.0 为 webpack.optimize.UglifyJsPlugin 定于 webpack v4.0.0

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ webpack-copy-plugin is not designed to copy files generated from the build process; rather, it is to copy files that already exist in the source tree, as part of the build process.
trans-unit.target: web️webpack webpack-copy-plugin 不能复制从构建过程中生成的文件；相反，它是复制源树中已经存在的文件，作为构建过程的一部分。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Access to the loader context inside the custom importer can be done using the this.webpackLoaderContext property.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️可以使用 this.webpackLoaderContext 属性访问自定义导入器中的加载器上下文。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Access to the loader context inside the custom plugin can be done using the less.webpackLoaderContext property.
trans-unit.target: the️可以使用 less.webpackLoaderContext 属性访问自定义插件中的加载程序上下文。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ By default the filename of the resulting file is the hash of the file's contents with the original extension of the required resource.
trans-unit.target: By️默认情况下，结果文件的文件名是文件内容的哈希值，带有所需资源的原始扩展名。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ By default the path and name you specify will output the file in that same directory, and will also use the same URI path to access the file.
trans-unit.target: By️默认情况下，您指定的路径和名称将在同一目录中输出文件，并且还将使用相同的URI路径来访问文件。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ By default, we only copy modified files during a webpack --watch or webpack-dev-server build. Setting this option to true will copy all files.
trans-unit.target: By️默认情况下，我们仅在 webpack --watch 或 webpack-dev-server 构建期间复制修改的文件。将此选项设置为 true 将复制所有文件。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ For prerendering with extract-text-webpack-plugin you should use css-loader/locals instead of style-loader!css-loaderin the prerendering bundle. It doesn't embed CSS but only exports the identifier mappings.
trans-unit.target: For️对于带有extract-text-webpack-plugin的预渲染，您应该使用 css-loader/locals 代替prerendering捆绑包中的 style-loader!css-loader 。它不嵌入CSS，而仅导出标识符映射。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If [0] is used, it will be replaced by the entire tested string, whereas [1] will contain the first capturing parenthesis of your regex and so on...
trans-unit.target: If️如果使用 [0] ，它将被整个测试的字符串替换，而 [1] 将包含您的正则表达式的第一个捕获括号，依此类推...

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you use custom function for the algorithm option, the default value is {}.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️如果对 algorithm 选项使用自定义函数，则默认值为 {} 。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you use custom function for the algorithm option, the default value of the compressionOptions option is {}.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️如果您对 algorithm 选项使用自定义函数，那么 compressionOptions 选项的默认值为 {} 。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you use your own minify function please read the minify section for cache invalidation correctly.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️如果您使用自己的 minify 功能，请正确阅读 minify 部分以了解缓存失效的信息。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you want webpack-dev-server to write files to the output directory during development, you can force it with the write-file-webpack-plugin.
trans-unit.target: If️如果您希望 webpack-dev-server 在开发过程中将文件写入输出目录，则可以使用 write-file-webpack-plugin 强制执行。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you want webpack-dev-server to write files to the output directory during development, you can force it with the writeToDisk option or the write-file-webpack-plugin.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️如果您希望 webpack-dev-server 在开发过程中将文件写入输出目录，则可以使用 writeToDisk 选项或 write-file-webpack-plugin 强制执行。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ If you want to use loader or plugin standalone see sections below, but this is not recommended.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️如果要独立使用 loader 或 plugin 请参阅下面的部分，但是不建议这样做。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Only for 4 version of webpack: Make sure that plugin place after any plugins that add images or other assets which you want to optimized.**
trans-unit.target: Only️仅适用于 4 个版本的 webpack ：确保该插件位于添加了要优化的图像或其他资产的所有插件之后。**

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Options such as data and file are unavailable and will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: data️诸如 data 和 file 类的选项不可用，将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Parallelization can speedup your build significantly and is therefore highly recommended
trans-unit.target: Para️并行化可以显着加快构建速度，因此强烈建议

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ Parallelization can speedup your build significantly and is therefore highly recommended.
trans-unit.target: Para️并行化可以显着加快构建速度，因此强烈建议使用。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ The filename option takes a value from webpack loader API. The option value will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️的 filename 选择需要从装载机的WebPack API值。选项值将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ The indentedSyntax option has true value for the sass extension.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️的 indentedSyntax 选项 true 的价值 sass 扩展。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ The sourceMap option takes a value from the compiler.devtool value by default.

trans-unit.target: ℹ️直到调用load函数才请求块

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ The loader will dynamically insert the <link href="path/to/file.css" rel="stylesheet"> tag at runtime via JavaScript. You should use MiniCssExtractPlugin if you want to include a static <link href="path/to/file.css" rel="stylesheet">.
trans-unit.target: The️加载程序将在运行时通过JavaScript动态插入 <link href="path/to/file.css" rel="stylesheet"> 标记。如果要包括静态 <link href="path/to/file.css" rel="stylesheet"> 则应使用MiniCssExtractPlugin。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ This file will be the only entry point for karma
trans-unit.target: ℹ️此文件将是 karma 的唯一 entry 点

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ This option is on by default in IE9, which has strict limitations on the number of style tags allowed on a page. You can enable or disable it with the singleton option.
trans-unit.target: ℹ️此选项在IE9中默认为启用，它对页面上允许的样式标签数量有严格的限制。您可以使用单例选项启用或禁用它。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ To ignore files by path please use the [globOptions.ignore](https://github.com/webpack-contrib/copy-webpack-plugin/blob/master/(#globoptions) option.
trans-unit.target: To️要按路径忽略文件，请使用[ globOptions.ignore ]（https://github.com/webpack-contrib/copy-webpack-plugin/blob/master/ ( #globoptions ）选项。

trans-unit.source: ℹ️ You can get the original source filename from Asset Objects.
trans-unit.target: You️您可以从Asset Objects获取原始源文件名。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Node Sass does not work with Yarn PnP feature.
⚠ %20 is space in a query string, because you can't use spaces in URLs
trans-unit.target: ⚠ %20 是查询字符串中的空格，因为您不能在URL中使用空格

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Alias can't be used together with default, namespace, side-effects, single and pure syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: ⚠别名不能与 default ， namespace ， side-effects ， single 和 pure 语法一起使用。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Aliases can't be used together with default or single syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: ⚠别名不能与 default 语法或 single 语法一起使用。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Aliases can't be used together with default, namespace, side-effects, single and pure syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: ⚠别名不能与 default ， namespace ， side-effects ， single 和 pure 语法一起使用。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Be careful, existing exports (export/module.exports/exports) in the original code and exporting new values can cause a failure.
trans-unit.target: ⚠请注意，原始代码中的现有导出（ export / module.exports / exports ）和导出新值可能会导致失败。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Be careful, existing imports (import/require) in the original code and importing new values can cause failure.
trans-unit.target: ⚠请注意，原始代码中现有的导入（ import / require ）和导入新值可能会导致失败。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ By default loader generate ES module named syntax.
trans-unit.target: ⚠默认情况下，加载程序会生成名为语法的ES模块。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Do not forget that this code will be used in the browser and not all browsers support latest ECMA features like let, const, arrow function expression and etc, we recommend use only ECMA 5 features, but it is depends what browsers you want to support ⚠ Do not forget that some DOM methods may not be available in older browsers, we recommended use only DOM core level 2 properties, but it is depends what browsers you want to support
trans-unit.target: ⚠不要忘记此代码将在浏览器中使用，并且并非所有浏览器都支持最新的ECMA功能（如 let ， const ， arrow function expression 等），我们建议仅使用ECMA 5功能，但这取决于您要支持的浏览器⚠不要忘记某些DOM方法在较旧的浏览器中可能不可用，我们建议仅使用DOM核心2级属性，但这取决于您要支持的浏览器

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Do not forget that this code will run in the browser alongside your application. Since not all browsers support latest ECMA features like let, const, arrow function expression and etc we recommend you to use only ECMA 5 features and syntax.
trans-unit.target: ⚠不要忘记此代码将在浏览器中与您的应用程序一起运行。由于并非所有浏览器都支持最新的ECMA功能，如 let ， const ， arrow function expression 等，因此我们建议您仅使用ECMA 5功能和语法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Do not use this option if source code contains ES module import(s)
trans-unit.target: if如果源代码包含ES模块导入，请不要使用此选项

trans-unit.source: ⚠ It is not allowed to use JavaScript reserved words in css class names.
trans-unit.target: 不允许在CSS类名称中使用JavaScript保留字。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Names of locals are converted to camelCase.
trans-unit.target: local当地人的姓名将转换为 camelCase 。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Names of locals are converted to camelcase, i.e. the exportLocalsConvention option has camelCaseOnly value by default.
trans-unit.target: local当地人的名称将转换为 camelCaseOnly ，即默认情况下 exportLocalsConvention 选项具有camelCaseOnly值。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Not possible to use single and multiple syntaxes together due to CommonJS format limitations.
trans-unit.target: Common由于CommonJS格式的限制，无法同时使用 single 和 multiple 语法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Not possible to use multiple default values due to ES module format limitations.
trans-unit.target: ES由于ES模块格式的限制，无法使用多个 default 值。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Not possible to use multiple single values due to CommonJS format limitations.
trans-unit.target: Common由于CommonJS格式的限制，无法使用多个 single 值。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Only camelCaseOnly value allowed if you set the namedExport value to true.
trans-unit.target: if如果将 namedExport 值设置为 true ,则仅允许 camelCaseOnly 值。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Options esModule and modules.namedExport in css-loader and MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader should be enabled.
trans-unit.target: ⚠选项 esModule 和 modules.namedExport 在 css-loader 和 MiniCssExtractPlugin.loader 应该启用。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ Options esModule and modules.namedExport in css-loader and style-loader should be enabled.
trans-unit.target: ⚠选项 esModule 和 modules.namedExport 在 css-loader 和 style-loader 应该启用。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ The insert function is serialized to string and passed to the plugin. This means that it won't have access to the scope of the webpack configuration module.
trans-unit.target: ⚠的 insert 函数序列化到字符串，并传递给插件。这意味着它将无法访问webpack配置模块的范围。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ You need to set type: "commonjs" to use single or multiple syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: ⚠您需要设置 type: "commonjs" 以使用 single 或 multiple 语法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠ You need to set type: "commonjs" to use single, multiple and pure syntaxes.
trans-unit.target: ⚠您需要设置 type: "commonjs" 以使用 single ， multiple 和 pure 语法。

trans-unit.target: ⚠与更少的3和4版本兼容的更少装载程序

trans-unit.source: ⚠ the attributes option takes precedence over the __webpack_nonce__ variable
trans-unit.target: attributes attributes 选项优先于 __webpack_nonce__ 变量

⚠️ cheap-source-map options don't work with this plugin.

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Always use require inside minify function when parallel option enabled
trans-unit.target: enabled️ 启用 parallel 选项时始终使用 require 内部 minify 功能

trans-unit.target: enabled️ 启用 parallel 选项时，始终使用 require 内部 minify 功能。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Since webpack >= v2.0.0, importing of JSON files will work by default. You might still want to use this if you use a custom file extension. See the v1.0.0 -> v2.0.0 Migration Guide for more information
trans-unit.target: Since️ 由于 webpack >= v2.0.0 ，默认情况下将导入JSON文件。如果使用自定义文件扩展名，则可能仍要使用此功能。有关更多信息，请参见v1.0.0-> v2.0.0迁移指南。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Behavior is undefined when unuse is called more often than use. Don't do that.
trans-unit.target: 当⚠️行为是不确定的 unuse 被称为往往比 use 。不要那样做

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Don't return directly \\ in to (i.e path\to\newFile) option because on UNIX the backslash is a valid character inside a path component, i.e., it's not a separator. On Windows, the forward slash and the backward slash are both separators. Instead please use / or path methods.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️不要直接返回 \\ 在 to （即 path\to\newFile ）选项，因为在UNIX上，反斜杠是路径组件内有效的字符，也就是说，它不是一个分隔符。在Windows上，正斜杠和反斜杠都是分隔符。相反，请使用 / 或 path 方法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Don't return directly \\ in transformPath (i.e path\to\newFile) option because on UNIX the backslash is a valid character inside a path component, i.e., it's not a separator. On Windows, the forward slash and the backward slash are both separators. Instead please use / or path methods.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️不要在 transformPath （即 path\to\newFile ）选项中直接返回 \\ ，因为在UNIX上，反斜杠是路径组件中的有效字符，即，它不是分隔符。在Windows上，正斜杠和反斜杠都是分隔符。相反，请使用 / 或 path 方法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Don't use directly \\ in context (i.e path\to\context) option because on UNIX the backslash is a valid character inside a path component, i.e., it's not a separator. On Windows, the forward slash and the backward slash are both separators. Instead please use / or path methods.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️不要在 context （即 path\to\context ）选项中直接使用 \\ ，因为在UNIX上，反斜杠是路径组件中的有效字符，即，它不是分隔符。在Windows上，正斜杠和反斜杠都是分隔符。相反，请使用 / 或 path 方法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Don't use directly \\ in from option if it is a glob (i.e path\to\file.ext) option because on UNIX the backslash is a valid character inside a path component, i.e., it's not a separator. On Windows, the forward slash and the backward slash are both separators. Instead please use /.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️如果它是 glob （即 path\to\file.ext ）选项，请不要直接使用 \\ in from 选项，因为在UNIX上，反斜杠是路径组件中的有效字符，即，它不是分隔符。在Windows上，正斜杠和反斜杠都是分隔符。相反，请使用 / 。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Don't use directly \\ in to (i.e path\to\dest) option because on UNIX the backslash is a valid character inside a path component, i.e., it's not a separator. On Windows, the forward slash and the backward slash are both separators. Instead please use / or path methods.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️不要直接使用 \\ in to （即 path\to\dest ）选项，因为在UNIX上，反斜杠是路径组件中的有效字符，即，它不是分隔符。在Windows上，正斜杠和反斜杠都是分隔符。相反，请使用 / 或 path 方法。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If files have the same name, the result is non-deterministic.
trans-unit.target: files️如果文件名相同，则结果不确定。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If you are using Babel you need to do the following in order for the setup to work
trans-unit.target: ⚠️如果您正在使用Babel，则需要执行以下操作才能使设置生效

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ If you use Circle CI or any other environment that doesn't provide real available count of CPUs then you need to setup explicitly number of CPUs to avoid Error: Call retries were exceeded (see #143, #202).
trans-unit.target: If️如果您使用Circle CI或任何其他不提供CPU实际可用数量的环境，则需要显式设置CPU数量，以避免 Error: Call retries were exceeded （请参阅＃143，＃202）。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Note that there is an overhead for saving the reading and saving the cache file, so only use this loader to cache expensive loaders.
trans-unit.target: Note️请注意，保存读取和保存缓存文件会产生开销，因此只能使用此装载程序来缓存昂贵的装载程序。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Note that you can't use a filename other than the [supported config formats] (e.g .postcssrc.js, postcss.config.js), this option only allows you to manually specify the directory where config lookup should start from
trans-unit.target: ⚠️注意，你不能用一个文件名以外的所支持的格式配置（如 .postcssrc.js ， postcss.config.js ），这个选项只允许你手动指定的目录，其中配置查找应该开始从

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ Otherwise it is unnecessary to set this option and is not recommended
trans-unit.target: Otherwise️否则无需设置此选项，不建议使用

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ The source argument will contain undefined if you don't use source maps.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️如果您不使用源映射，则 source 参数将包含 undefined 。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ We highly recommend using the txt extension. Using js/cjs/mjs extensions may conflict with existing assets which leads to broken code.
trans-unit.target: ⚠️我们强烈建议使用 txt 扩展名。使用 js / cjs / mjs 扩展名可能会与现有资产发生冲突，从而导致代码损坏。

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ When postcss-loader is used standalone (without css-loader) don't use @import in your CSS, since this can lead to quite bloated bundles
trans-unit.target: When️当独立使用 postcss-loader （不使用 css-loader ）时，请勿在CSS中使用 @import ，因为这可能会导致包肿

trans-unit.source: ⚠️ webpack requires an identifier (ident) in options when {Function}/require is used (Complex Options). The ident can be freely named as long as it is unique. It's recommended to name it (ident: 'postcss')
trans-unit.target: web️ 当使用 {Function}/require （复杂选项）时，webpack 在 options 需要标识符（ ident ）。该 ident 可以，只要它是唯一可以自由命名。建议命名（ ident: 'postcss' ）
